code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PromptSuggestions=_ref=>{let{onSelectPrompt}=_ref;const suggestions=["What is compound interest?","How to create a budget?","Explain stocks and bonds","Tips for saving money","What is cryptocurrency?"];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"space-y-2",children:suggestions.map((suggestion,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onSelectPrompt(suggestion),className:"block w-full text-left p-2 rounded-lg bg-[#272626] hover:bg-[#363636] transition-colors text-sm",children:suggestion},index))});};export default PromptSuggestions;
